subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky is looking to become the second team to reach the Final Four with five freshman starters, and the first since Michigan’s 1992 team that featured a freshman lineup known as the Fab Five.
snippet: Kentucky is looking to become the second team to reach the Final Four with five freshman starters, and the first since Michigan’s 1992 team that featured a freshman lineup known as the Fab Five.
